summary: Instead of golf clapping like idiots, npcs will watch and idle.
descriptionHtml:
No Clapping Allowed! v1.0

Ever cringe when you see NPCs clapping? (that awkward slow golf clap, arms outstretched?)
Now they will simply idle, perhaps cross their arms or look on in silence.

Also useful for some of the adult mods that cause spectator crowds to assemble.
----

These files overwrite those located at skyrimDatameshesactorscharacteranimations
using the following filenames:

npc_applaud2.hkx
npc_applaud3.hkx
npc_applaud4.hkx
npc_applaud5.hkx

instructions:
Unpack the included files to your skyrim folder and it should automatically do the rest.

Credits:
TheFigment for his HKX to KF converter (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1797) so I could figure out which vanilla anims were the bad ones!
Niftools team for NifSkope so I could view the .KF files
Bethesda for this awesome game! (except for those silly clap anims lol)
